nodes.text: The Berenge sector was a largely empty sector in the galaxy. A largely administrative division, the sector was once controlled by the San Tekka clan on a lease from the Galactic Republic for hyperspace experimentation. After the lease expired, a group of academics led by Professor Thaddeus Wolk petitioned for the sector to be set aside for academic purposes. While the sector's use was being disputed, the Nihil Tempest Runner Lourna Dee and the scientist Chancey Yarrow hid the Gravity's Heart space station in the sector, in order to test an experimental gravity well projector.

The Berenge sector first appeared in the 2021 novel The High Republic: Out of the Shadows. In a preview of the novel published in The High Republic: Into the Dark, the sector was referred to as a star system.
